resources.string: One of the famous restaurants in the region, offers all kinds of delicious pizza as well as fast food and delivery service is available.
End of Saady street, North of 2nd district, New damietta, Damietta

One of the distinctive restaurants really, offers all types of grills and tajines as well as seafood with high quality and distinct craftsmanship in cooking and allows you to choose live fish yourself before cooking.
Saady street, North of 2nd district, New damietta, Damietta
One of the best restaurants in terms of service very suitable for dating offers various types of Italian pasta dishes decorated with interest rates a bit high.
End of Saady street, North of 2nd district, New damietta, Damietta
Gym - Fitness Center - Courses - Eastern - Zumba - Aerobic - Self Defense - Belly - Buttocks - Kids Courses

Olympia sports club is the first private club in Damietta, Egypt We provide sports, Cultural, social, educational and recreational center to be suitable for the whole family to achieve the requirements of each individual in it. The Club offers: 
- Swimming pools (Olympic, semi-Olympic and kids) 
- Tennis courts 
- Squash courts 
- Football field 
- Multipurpose court ( football, Basketball, Handball and volley ball) 
- Fighting sports ( karate, taekwondo, judo and fencing ) 
- Men’s health club 
- Women’s health club 
- Restaurants 
- Business men centre 
- Table Tennis 
- Billiards hall 
- Kids area 
- Outdoor cinema
They have many Play Station games large screens and offering drinks and snacks
Saady street, North of 2nd district, New damietta, Damietta

Offers a range of interesting games: 
- VR

- Escape rooms

All kinds of groceries, freezers, cans, dairy products, hygiene items, clothes and household items, there is a children\'s play area and a small restaurant
